CustomProfile.Description: After Burner Climax (Elfloader2) is the Elf Loader 2 version of Sega’s high‑octane jet combat shooter. Like the original, players pilot modern fighters through cinematic missions full of enemy aircraft and missiles, using throttle controls and a yoke to dodge and lock onto multiple targets. Building up your meter triggers Climax Mode, slowing time and allowing you to unleash devastating missile salvos to clear the screen. This cabinet update retains the fast‑paced, on‑rails aerial action while running on Sega’s Elf Loader 2 hardware.
